meanings.definition: To make musical sounds with the voice
meanings.sent1: She sings beautifully in the choir.
meanings.sent2: The bird sings a lovely tune every morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat sings along with the music on TV.
meanings.sent4: The wind sings through the trees on a calm night.
meanings.sent5: His heart sings with joy when he hears her voice.

meanings.definition: To produce musical notes by means of the voice
meanings.sent1: He sings his favorite song at karaoke.
meanings.sent2: The opera singer sings with great passion.
meanings.sent3: The dog sings along to the harmonica playing.
meanings.sent4: The kettle sings when the water boils.
meanings.sent5: The violin sings sweetly in the hands of the musician.

meanings.sent1: The band sings at the local bar every Friday.
meanings.sent2: She sings with emotion during her solo.
meanings.sent3: The baby sings a lullaby to the teddy bear.
meanings.sent4: The stars sing a silent melody in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The choir sings in perfect harmony at the concert.

meanings.definition: To give voice to a melody
meanings.sent1: He sings a tune that touches the heart.
meanings.sent2: The children sing together in the school play.
meanings.sent3: The robot sings a mechanical song for fun.
meanings.sent4: The river sings a soothing melody as it flows.
meanings.sent5: The nightingale sings a sweet melody in the garden.

meanings.definition: To express oneself in musical tones
meanings.sent1: She sings her feelings through the lyrics.
meanings.sent2: The musician sings his emotions through the guitar.
meanings.sent3: The parrot sings a funny song to entertain.
meanings.sent4: The rain sings a melancholic tune on the roof.
meanings.sent5: The heart sings a melody of love in his presence.
